title: Resistance 3 – v1.05 + 2 DLCs + RPCS3 Emu + Offline Co-Op
body:
Resistance 3 – v1.05 + 2 DLCs + RPCS3 Emu + Offline Co-Op


Genres/Tags: Action, Shooter, First-person, 3D
Companies: Insomniac Games, Sony Computer Entertainment
Languages: RUS/ENG/MULTI15
Original Size: 34.3 GB
Repack Size: from 6.6 GB [Selective Download]

 
 

Download Mirrors

  • 1337x | [magnet] [.torrent file only]
  • RuTor [magnet]
  • Tapochek.net
  • Filehoster: MultiUpload (10+ hosters, interchangeable) [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehoster: PixelDrain
  • Filehoster: ZippyShare
  • Filehoster: LetsUpload [Use JDownloader2]
  • Filehosters: Google Drive, OneDrive + others (Uploaded by crackhub213)
  • Filehoster: OneDrive (Uploaded by DyR0 t(-_-t), NOT compatible with other mirrors)

Screenshots (Click to enlarge)


Repack Features

  • Based on PS3 BCES01118 ISO release: 32.6 GB
  • All updates till v1.05 installed over (1.1 GB)
  • 2 DLCs (Survival Pack & Brutality Pack, 329 MB) are installed over and activated
  • Bonus soundtrack in MP3 (112 MB) added
  • PS3 Firmware v4.88 (197 MB) added
  • RPCS3 v0.0.17-12565 emulator with built-in updater included, so you can always keep the emu in the fresh condition
  • In case you have troubles with newer RPCS3 builds, you can always restore version bundled with the repack by unpacking “Restore Older Emulator.zip”
  • 100% Lossless & MD5 Perfect: all files are identical to originals after installation
  • Non-game files (other game demos) ripped, NOTHING re-encoded
  • Selective Download feature: you may skip downloading and installing of optional language packs (English and some other langs w/o their own voiceovers are included by default), “Behind the scenes” bonus videos, 3D Stereo Mode videos and bonus sountrack
  • Significantly smaller archive size (compressed from cumulative 34.3 to 6.6~10.8 GB, depending on selected components)
  • Installation takes 10-25 minutes (depending on your system and selected components)
  • After-install integrity check so you could make sure that everything installed properly
  • HDD space after installation: up to 28.8 GB
  • The game supports local co-op with KBM & controllers plugged-in and configured in emulator settings
  • Language can be changed in emulator settings (RMB on game title –> Change Custom Configuration –> System –> Console Language)
  • By default some PS controller buttons are mapped to mouse, so you could play the game as any PC shooter. You can change those mappings in emulator settings – take a note on Mouse Acceleation/Deadzone settings to adjust the game for your system
  • By default the game runs in native 720p resolution, which you can increase in emu settings at cost of perfomance hit
  • Some emulator settings are CPU-dependant, so you should check them all and adjust accordingly to your configuration. Don’t forget to clean all caches for the game after any CPU/GPU setting changes
  • Loading time after Insomniac logo can be several minutes long while staying on the black screen – just wait
  • NEVER close the game before quitting to main menu first – this may break save files
  • If the game crashes for you while loading 1st level – delete “dev_hdd0\home\00000001” folder, this will remove all saves and reset game state; also, clean all caches generated by the emu and run it again
  • On some further levels the game may also stuck on level loading. Then close the emu, run it again and change SPU Decoder from “Recompiler (LLVM)” to “Recompiler (ASMJIT)” in emulator settings for this particular game. Pass that stuck place and you can return the LLVM back
  • Repack uses XTool library by Razor12911
  • At least 2 GB of free RAM (inc. virtual) required for installing this repack

Game Description

Resistance 3 is a full-featured adventure shooter based in a brutal alternative universe in which humanity is faced with a struggle for survival against a relentless alien race in a decimated America.

Journey as mankind’s last hope, Joseph Capelli, across a devastated America, making your way from Haven, Oklahoma to New York City

A fully loaded arsenal of innovative weapons, including classics like the Bullseye, Auger and a new weapon upgrade system

Fully featured offline and online cooperative modes that let you share the experience

Engage smarter and more agile Chimeran enemies and experience new, more focused, progression-based multiplayer experience

You can skip downloading of “Behind the Scenes” videos, 3D Stereo Mode videos, bonus soundtrack and language packs you don’t need. Here is the list of optional files:

  • fg-optional-3d-videos.bin (3D Stere Mode videos, can be used if you have compatible hardware and activated 3D Stereo Mode in emulator settings)
  • fg-optional-bonus-soundtrack.bin (Bonus soundtrack in MP3 format)
  • fg-optional-bonus-videos.bin (Behind the Scene videos, available in the game’s menu for bonus points)
  • fg-optional-french.bin
  • fg-optional-german.bin
  • fg-optional-italian.bin
  • fg-optional-japanese.bin
  • fg-optional-polish.bin
  • fg-optional-portuguese.bin
  • fg-optional-russian.bin
  • fg-optional-spanish.bin

In example, if you want to launch the game with Spanish UI/Subtitles/Voiceovers – skip all “optional” files, but download fg-optional-spanish.bin & all main files (01-03).

Cross-repack compatibility

If you have downloaded and still have some of my RPCS3-powered repacks, you can use fg-ps3-firmware-v4.88.bin from any of those and save 145 MB of traffic.
